first_para: Oliver Newton Colvile (born 26 August 1959) is the current Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Plymouth Sutton & Devonport; he won the seat from the Labour candidate Linda Gilroy at the 2010 General Election.

full.extract: Oliver Newton Colvile (born 26 August 1959) is the current Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Plymouth Sutton & Devonport; he won the seat from the Labour candidate Linda Gilroy at the 2010 General Election.
full.title: Oliver Colvile
